summary: Completed comprehensive testing of FlexCard physical card system and violet color implementation. All new physical card APIs working correctly including card generation, status checking, QR redirect, and activation flow. Landing page successfully uses violet #8645D6 color. Minor issue found with default profile cover color using #6366F1 instead of #8645D6.

design_issues.issue: Default cover color uses #6366F1 instead of requested #8645D6
design_issues.impact: New profiles get blue-violet cover instead of pure violet

passed_tests: Landing page uses violet color #8645D6 throughout interface
Landing page shows 18 elements correctly using violet color
CTA buttons display correct violet background rgb(134, 69, 214)
No gradient elements found (successfully replaced with solid colors)
Backend API /api/cards/generate creates physical cards with FC prefix
Backend API /api/cards/{cardId} returns correct card status
QR redirect /c/{cardId} correctly redirects to /activate/{cardId}
Card activation page loads with correct card ID display
Card activation page shows login/register options for non-authenticated users
Card activation flow works for authenticated users
Backend API /api/cards/{cardId}/activate processes card activation
Backend API /api/cards/user/my-cards returns user's linked cards
Registration flow works and redirects to dashboard
Dashboard loads with violet branding and navigation
Card editor interface loads and functions correctly
Profile form fields (first name, last name, title, company, bio) work
Cover color picker is present and functional
Live preview shows profile updates in real-time
Public profile page loads and displays correctly
Public profile contact form works and submits successfully
Save contact (vCard download) functionality available
Share functionality available on public profiles
FlexCard branding appears correctly in footer
Avatar and cover image upload functionality works
All previous FlexCard features continue to work correctly
action_item_for_main_agent: Update default profile cover color from #6366F1 to #8645D6 in backend profile creation code (lines 292, 375 in server.py) to match the violet color requirement

success_percentage.backend: 100% (18/18 API endpoints working including new physical card system)
success_percentage.frontend: 95% (all functionality working, minor default color issue)
